meanings.definition: The interaction or cooperation of two or more organizations, substances, or other agents to produce a combined effect greater than the sum of their separate effects.
meanings.sent1: The synergia between the different departments led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent2: The team's synergia in brainstorming sessions resulted in innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The synergia between the ingredients in the recipe created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Their synergia on stage was like a symphony of talents coming together.
meanings.sent5: The synergia of colors in the painting made it truly captivating.

meanings.definition: The combined power of a group of things when they are working together that is greater than the total power achieved by each working separately.
meanings.sent1: The synergia of the engines allowed the plane to take off smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The synergia of the team members made the project completion faster.
meanings.sent3: The synergia of the tools in the toolbox made the carpenter's work easier.
meanings.sent4: Their synergia in the game was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The synergia of the elements in nature creates a harmonious balance.
